pli-tv-pvr19:1.1: “How many kinds of offenses are there by body?
pli-tv-pvr19:1.2: How many are done by speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:1.3: How many kinds of offenses are there for concealing?
pli-tv-pvr19:2.1: There are six kinds of offenses by body,
pli-tv-pvr19:2.3: There are three kinds of offenses for concealing,
pli-tv-pvr19:3.1: How many kinds of offenses are there at dawn?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.2: How many after the third announcement?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.3: How many here have eight parts?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.4: Through how many are they all included?
pli-tv-pvr19:4.1: There are three kinds of offenses at dawn,
pli-tv-pvr19:4.4: They are all included through one.
pli-tv-pvr19:5.1: How many roots are there of the Monastic Law,
pli-tv-pvr19:5.2: Which were laid down by the Buddha?
pli-tv-pvr19:5.3: How many are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law?
pli-tv-pvr19:5.4: How many kinds of concealing are there of grave offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:6.1: There are two roots of the Monastic Law,
pli-tv-pvr19:6.2: Which were laid down by the Buddha;
pli-tv-pvr19:6.3: Two are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law,
pli-tv-pvr19:6.4: There are two kinds of concealing of grave offenses.
pli-tv-pvr19:7.1: How many kinds of offenses are there concerning the next village?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.2: How many because of crossing a river?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.3: How many serious offenses are there in relation to meat?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.4: How many offenses of wrong conduct are there in relation to meat?
pli-tv-pvr19:8.1: There are four kinds of offenses concerning the next village,
pli-tv-pvr19:8.2: Four because of crossing a river;
pli-tv-pvr19:8.3: There is one serious offense in relation to meat,
pli-tv-pvr19:8.4: And nine offenses of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr19:9.1: How many kinds of offenses are there by speech at night?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.2: How many are there by speech by day?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.3: How many kinds of offenses are there for one who’s giving?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.4: And how many for one who’s taking?
pli-tv-pvr19:10.1: There are two kinds of offenses by speech at night,
pli-tv-pvr19:10.3: There are three kinds of offenses for one who is giving,
pli-tv-pvr19:11.0: 2. Offenses that are clearable by confession, etc.
pli-tv-pvr19:11.1: How many kinds of offenses are clearable by confession?
pli-tv-pvr19:11.2: How many require amends to be made?
pli-tv-pvr19:11.3: How many here do not to require amends,
pli-tv-pvr19:11.4: According to the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:12.1: Five kinds are clearable by confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:12.2: Six require amends to be made;
pli-tv-pvr19:12.3: One here does not require amends,
pli-tv-pvr19:12.4: According to the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:13.1: How many are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law?
pli-tv-pvr19:13.2: And how many are done by body or speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:13.3: How many grain juices are allowable at the wrong time?
pli-tv-pvr19:13.4: How many appointments are made through one motion and three announcements?
pli-tv-pvr19:14.1: Two are said to be heavy in the Monastic Law,
pli-tv-pvr19:14.2: And are done by body or speech;
pli-tv-pvr19:14.3: One grain juice is allowable at the wrong time,
pli-tv-pvr19:14.4: One appointment is made through one motion and three announcements.
pli-tv-pvr19:15.1: How many offenses entailing expulsion are done by body?
pli-tv-pvr19:15.2: How many grounds are there for belonging to the same Buddhist sect?
pli-tv-pvr19:15.3: For how many kinds of people are there non-countable days?
pli-tv-pvr19:16.1: Two offenses entailing expulsion are done by body,
pli-tv-pvr19:16.2: There are two grounds for belonging to the same Buddhist sect;
pli-tv-pvr19:16.3: There are non-countable days for two kinds of people,
pli-tv-pvr19:16.4: There are two rules that concern 3.5 centimeters.
pli-tv-pvr19:17.1: How many are there on having beaten oneself?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.2: How many kinds of people cause a schism in the Sangha?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.3: How many here are immediate offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.4: How many ways are there of doing a motion?
pli-tv-pvr19:18.1: There are two on having beaten oneself,
pli-tv-pvr19:18.2: Two kinds cause a schism in the Sangha;
pli-tv-pvr19:18.4: There are two ways of doing a motion.
pli-tv-pvr19:19.1: How many kinds offenses are there for killing living beings?
pli-tv-pvr19:19.2: How many offenses entailing expulsion are there because of speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:19.3: How many kinds were spoken because of indecent speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:19.4: How many kinds because of matchmaking?
pli-tv-pvr19:20.1: There are three kinds of offenses for killing living beings,
pli-tv-pvr19:20.2: There are three offenses entailing expulsion because of speech;
pli-tv-pvr19:20.3: Three kinds were spoken because of indecent speech,
pli-tv-pvr19:20.4: And three kinds because of matchmaking.
pli-tv-pvr19:21.1: How many kinds of people should not be ordained?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.2: How many things bring the legal procedures together?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.3: How many kinds are said to be expelled?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.4: How many are included in a single proclamation?
pli-tv-pvr19:22.1: Three kinds of people should not be ordained,
pli-tv-pvr19:22.2: Three things bring the legal procedures together;
pli-tv-pvr19:22.3: Three kinds are said to be expelled,
pli-tv-pvr19:22.4: Three are included in a single proclamation.
pli-tv-pvr19:23.1: How many kinds of offenses are there for stealing?
pli-tv-pvr19:23.2: How many because of sexual intercourse?
pli-tv-pvr19:23.3: How many kinds of offenses for cutting?
pli-tv-pvr19:24.1: There are three kinds of offenses for stealing,
pli-tv-pvr19:24.3: There are three kinds of offenses for cutting,
pli-tv-pvr19:25.1: In the subchapter on the instructor of nuns,
pli-tv-pvr19:25.2: Is there an offense of wrong conduct together with an offense entailing confession?
pli-tv-pvr19:25.3: How many groups of nine are mentioned there?
pli-tv-pvr19:26.1: In the subchapter on the instructor of nuns,
pli-tv-pvr19:26.2: There is one offense of wrong conduct together with one offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-pvr19:26.3: Four groups of nine are mentioned there,
pli-tv-pvr19:27.2: Have been declared to the nuns?
pli-tv-pvr19:27.4: How many are the offenses of wrong conduct, together with the offense entailing confession?
pli-tv-pvr19:28.2: Have been declared to the nuns;
pli-tv-pvr19:28.4: There is one offense of wrong conduct together with one offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr19:29.1: How many kinds of offenses are there for one who is traveling?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.2: And how many are there for standing?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.3: How many kinds of offenses are there for sitting?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.4: And how many are there for lying down?
pli-tv-pvr19:30.1: There are four kinds of offenses for one who is traveling,
pli-tv-pvr19:30.2: And the same number for standing;
pli-tv-pvr19:30.3: There are four kinds of offenses for sitting down,
pli-tv-pvr19:30.4: And the same number for lying down.
pli-tv-pvr19:32.1: There are five offenses entailing confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:34.1: There are nine offenses entailing confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:35.3: Should be confessed through how many statements,
pli-tv-pvr19:35.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:36.1: There are five offenses entailing confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:36.3: That should be confessed through a single statement,
pli-tv-pvr19:36.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:37.3: Should be confessed by how many statements,
pli-tv-pvr19:37.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:38.1: There are nine offenses entailing confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:38.3: That should be confessed by one statement,
pli-tv-pvr19:38.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:39.3: Should one describe and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:39.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:40.1: There are five offenses entailing confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:40.3: Where one should describe the basis and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:40.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:41.3: Should one describe and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:41.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:42.1: There are nine offenses entailing confession,
pli-tv-pvr19:42.3: Where one should describe the basis and then confess,
pli-tv-pvr19:42.4: As spoken by the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:43.1: How many offenses are there after the third announcement?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.2: How many are there because of speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.3: How many are there for one who is eating?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.4: And how many because of cooked food?
pli-tv-pvr19:44.1: There are three offenses after the third announcement,
pli-tv-pvr19:44.3: There are three offenses for one who is eating,
pli-tv-pvr19:45.1: Of all offenses after the third announcement,
pli-tv-pvr19:45.3: And for how many are there offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:45.4: And for how many is there a legal issue?
pli-tv-pvr19:46.1: Of all offenses after the third announcement,
pli-tv-pvr19:46.3: And there are offenses for five,
pli-tv-pvr19:47.1: For how many are there decisions?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.2: For how many are there resolutions?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.3: For how many are there non-offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.4: For how many reasons does one shine?
pli-tv-pvr19:48.4: And one shines for three reasons.
pli-tv-pvr19:49.1: How many kinds of offenses are there by body at night?
pli-tv-pvr19:49.2: How many are there by body by day?
pli-tv-pvr19:49.3: How many kinds of offenses are there for staring?
pli-tv-pvr19:50.1: There are two kinds of offenses by body at night,
pli-tv-pvr19:50.3: There is one kind of offense for staring,
pli-tv-pvr19:51.2: Should one confess out of confidence in others?
pli-tv-pvr19:51.3: How many kinds are said to be ejected?
pli-tv-pvr19:51.4: And how many are the proper conducts?
pli-tv-pvr19:52.2: One should confess out of confidence in others;
pli-tv-pvr19:52.3: Three kinds are said to be ejected,
pli-tv-pvr19:53.1: How many cases of lying are there?
pli-tv-pvr19:53.3: How many offenses entailing acknowledgment are there?
pli-tv-pvr19:53.4: And for how many is there confession?
pli-tv-pvr19:54.1: There are five cases of lying,
pli-tv-pvr19:54.3: There are twelve offenses entailing acknowledgment,
pli-tv-pvr19:54.4: And there is confession for four.
pli-tv-pvr19:55.1: How many factors does lying have?
pli-tv-pvr19:55.2: And how many factors does the observance day have?
pli-tv-pvr19:55.3: How many qualities does a qualified messenger have?
pli-tv-pvr19:55.4: How many kinds of proper conduct are there for the monastics of other religions?
pli-tv-pvr19:56.2: The observance day has eight factors;
pli-tv-pvr19:56.3: A qualified messenger has eight qualities,
pli-tv-pvr19:56.4: There are eight kinds of proper conduct for monastics of other religions.
pli-tv-pvr19:57.1: How many statements are there for an ordination?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.2: For how many should one get up?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.3: To how many should one give a seat?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.4: Through how many qualities is one an instructor of the nuns?
pli-tv-pvr19:58.1: There are eight statements for an ordination,
pli-tv-pvr19:58.2: One should get up for eight;
pli-tv-pvr19:58.3: Likewise give a seat to eight,
pli-tv-pvr19:58.4: One is an instructor of the nuns through eight qualities.
pli-tv-pvr19:59.1: For how many is there a ‘cutting off’?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.2: For how many is there a serious offense?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.3: And for how many is there no offense—
pli-tv-pvr19:59.4: Yet all of them did the same act as basis?
pli-tv-pvr19:60.1: There is a ‘cutting off’ for one,
pli-tv-pvr19:60.3: And there is no offense for four—
pli-tv-pvr19:60.4: Yet all of them did the same act as basis.
pli-tv-pvr19:61.1: How many are the grounds for resentment?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.2: How many cause a schism in the Sangha?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.3: How many here are immediate offenses?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.4: How many acts are there through a motion?
pli-tv-pvr19:62.1: There are nine grounds for resentment,
pli-tv-pvr19:62.2: Nine cause a schism in the Sangha;
pli-tv-pvr19:62.3: There are nine immediate offenses here,
pli-tv-pvr19:62.4: There are nine acts through a motion.
pli-tv-pvr19:63.0: 4. Persons one should not pay respect to, etc.
pli-tv-pvr19:63.1: How many kinds of people should one not bow down to,
pli-tv-pvr19:63.2: Nor raise one’s joined palms to, nor do acts of respect toward?
pli-tv-pvr19:63.3: For how many is there an offense of wrong conduct?
pli-tv-pvr19:63.4: How many keepings of a robe are there?
pli-tv-pvr19:64.1: There are ten kinds of people one should not bow down to,
pli-tv-pvr19:64.2: Nor raise one’s joined palms to, nor do acts of respect toward;
pli-tv-pvr19:64.3: There is an offense of wrong conduct for ten,
pli-tv-pvr19:64.4: There are ten keepings of a robe.
pli-tv-pvr19:65.1: To how many kinds who have completed the rainy-season residence
pli-tv-pvr19:65.3: When one exists, to how many kinds should it be given?
pli-tv-pvr19:65.4: And to how many kinds should it not be given?
pli-tv-pvr19:66.1: Robe-cloth should be given to five kinds
pli-tv-pvr19:66.2: Who have completed the rainy-season residence;
pli-tv-pvr19:66.3: When one exists, it should be give to seven kinds,
pli-tv-pvr19:66.4: It should not be given to sixteen kinds.
pli-tv-pvr19:67.1: Having concealing how many hundreds of offenses
pli-tv-pvr19:67.4: Should he be released from probation?
pli-tv-pvr19:68.4: He should be released from probation.
pli-tv-pvr19:69.1: How many kinds of flaws in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:69.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:69.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:70.1: Twelve kinds of flaws in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:70.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:70.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:71.1: How many kinds of accomplishments of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:71.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:71.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:72.1: Four kinds of accomplishments of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:72.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:72.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:73.1: How many kinds of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:73.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:73.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:73.4: How many were legitimate and how many illegitimate?
pli-tv-pvr19:74.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:74.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:74.6: Were mentioned of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:75.1: How many kinds of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:75.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:75.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:75.4: How many were legitimate and how many illegitimate?
pli-tv-pvr19:76.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:76.3: In the Monastic Law, in the account of Campā,
pli-tv-pvr19:76.6: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr19:77.1: In regard to the classes of offenses taught by the unbounded Victor, the Unshakable One,
pli-tv-pvr19:77.3: How many are settled without settling?
pli-tv-pvr19:77.4: I ask you who are skilled in analysis, please say.
pli-tv-pvr19:78.1: In regard to the classes of offenses taught by the unbounded Victor, the Unshakable One,
pli-tv-pvr19:78.4: Skilled in analysis, I declare this to you.
pli-tv-pvr19:79.1: How many who are destined to misery
pli-tv-pvr19:79.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:79.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:80.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:80.3: Destined to misery, bound for hell,
pli-tv-pvr19:80.4: He who causes a schism in the Sangha remains there for an eon;
pli-tv-pvr19:80.5: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:81.1: How many who are not destined to misery
pli-tv-pvr19:81.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:81.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:82.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:82.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:83.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:83.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:84.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:84.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:85.1: How many kinds of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:85.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:85.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:86.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:86.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:87.1: How many kinds of flaws in legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:87.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:87.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:88.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:88.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:89.1: How many kinds of accomplishments of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:89.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:89.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:90.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:90.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:91.1: How many kinds of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:91.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:91.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:92.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:92.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:93.1: How many kinds of legal procedures
pli-tv-pvr19:93.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:93.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:94.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:94.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:95.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:95.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:96.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:96.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:97.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:97.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:98.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:98.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:99.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:99.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:100.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:100.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:101.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:101.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:102.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:102.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:103.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:103.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:104.1: One hundred and eighty-eight offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-pvr19:104.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:104.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:105.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:105.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:106.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:106.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:107.1: How many rules to be trained in
pli-tv-pvr19:107.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?
pli-tv-pvr19:107.3: We will listen to the Monastic Law from you,
pli-tv-pvr19:108.1: Seventy-five rules to be trained in
pli-tv-pvr19:108.2: Were mentioned by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun;
pli-tv-pvr19:108.3: Listen to the Monastic Law from me,
pli-tv-pvr19:109.1: Thus far you have asked well,
pli-tv-pvr19:109.2: Thus far I have answered well;
pli-tv-pvr19:109.3: In either the questions or the answers,
pli-tv-pvr19:109.4: There is nothing other than the Teaching.”
pli-tv-pvr19:110.1: The second collection of verses is finished.
